snippet.title: Hazardous Course 2 in 1:21:22 (100%)
snippet.description:
This here's been something I've wanted to do for quite a while. A speedrun of the Half-Life mod Hazardous Course 2 by Richman.

Between all practice runs and just learning the maps, this run has been in production for about 12 hours total as a conservative estimate since around the start of July 2019. Is the end product perfect? lol no. I made quite a load of small mistakes and even a couple of bigger mistakes that cost me quite a bit of time. The run can definitely go sub-1:20 but I probably won't be the one to do it. Nontheless, I am very pleased with how this run came out. Enjoy!


Technical Information

Mod: Hazardous Course 2 (For Half-Life)
Mod Author: Richman
Year of Release: 2012
Timer Start: On load of hc2a1.
Timer Stop: When player control is lost as the ending scene starts.
Final Time: 1:21:22.376
Tools Used: Bunnymod XT (by YaLTeR)
Run Category: 100% Scripted
Extent of Scripted Play: Autojump and Bhop Cap Removal, that's it.

This probably wouldn't be accepted to any leaderboards, by the way. I forgot to record demos and I forgot to cap my framerate. Oops. Still an unofficial World Record anyway, right? I can't find anything faster that doesn't involve save-warping. Perhaps I'll do something more official one day, claim a spot on a leaderboard. That said though, I mostly do this for fun and for my own satisfaction. I don't take speedrunning super seriously.
